description:
cmd/6a, cmd/6l: add support for AES-NI instrutions and PSHUFD
This CL adds support for the these 7 new instructions to 6a/6l in
preparation of the upcoming CL for AES-NI accelerated crypto/aes:
AESENC, AESENCLAST, AESDEC, AESDECLAST, AESIMC, AESKEYGENASSIST, 
and PSHUFD.

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5970055/diff/21007/src/cmd/6l/span.c
File src/cmd/6l/span.c (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5970055/diff/21007/src/cmd/6l/span.c#newcode1598
src/cmd/6l/span.c:1598: case Zibxm_r:
I think instead of adding a new Z you can change Zibm_r to have the while loop. Either way. If you keep this please put it next to the Zibm_r case above and also move the enum next to the Zibm_r definition in l.h

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c2719ae32b09 ***

cmd/6a, cmd/6l: add support for AES-NI instrutions and PSHUFD
This CL adds support for the these 7 new instructions to 6a/6l in
preparation of the upcoming CL for AES-NI accelerated crypto/aes:
AESENC, AESENCLAST, AESDEC, AESDECLAST, AESIMC, AESKEYGENASSIST, 
and PSHUFD.
